title: How the U.S. Child-Care Crisis is Torturing Parents
itunes:title: How the U.S. Child-Care Crisis is Torturing Parents
description:
Dr. Chris Beyrer, Professor in Public Health and Human Rights at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses the FDA meeting regarding Pfizer vaccine authorization. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Kurt Wagner shares his insight on why a Facebook breakup would demolish Mark Zuckerberg’s social media empire. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News U.S. Health Care Reporter Cynthia Koons talk about why the U.S. child care crisis is torturing parents and the economy. And we Drive to the Close with Eric Jackson, Founder and President at EMJ Capital.

Host: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
